summary: A new /instant-price-calculator route and page were added and wired into the existing SiteLayout, with TopNav and SiteFooter navigation updated to include the new link. The page includes the required dropdown labels/options and uses a centralized pricing matrix helper. Some acceptance-criteria items (note text, neutral placeholder state, and WhatsApp button target/rel) cannot be fully verified due to truncation of the new page file in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: If one or both dropdowns are not selected yet, the price area shows a neutral placeholder state (no estimate).
missing_requirements.reason: The InstantPriceCalculator.tsx diff is truncated right as the price display section begins, so the placeholder/empty-state behavior cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the note text exactly as: “Final price may vary based on requirements” within the calculator section near the estimate.
missing_requirements.reason: The page diff is truncated before the full estimate/note section is shown, so the exact note text cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a “Contact / WhatsApp” button below the estimated price that opens WhatsApp in a new tab (target=_blank) with appropriate rel attributes.
missing_requirements.reason: The new page diff is truncated before the CTA button implementation is shown, so the presence of the button and its target/rel attributes cannot be verified.
